Notes.Text:
This update for avahi fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-38470: Ensure each label is at least one byte long (bsc#1215947).
- CVE-2023-38473: Fixed a reachable assertion when parsing a host name (bsc#1216419).
Notes.Title: Details
